summary:
Is something missing in your life? Do you no longer have anything to take inordinate amounts of time building the perfect Stormcloak dog-girl fucking a busty-sub Forsworn dick-girl?

Well look no further! Areola to the rescue!
descriptionHtml:

[size=5][color=#afeeee][i][font=arial]Find out Stella's "secret" using this one amazing weird trick[/font][/i][/color]
[color=#afeeee][i][font=arial black]that doctors don't want you to know![/font][/i][/color][/size]

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57157-3-1408259928.png[/img]
[color=#8ce282][font=arial black][size=6]Tit Kit v1[/size][/font][/color]
[size=5] 
[i][color=#ff00ff][b]Update[/b][font=Arial Black]: [/font][font=Arial]Photoshop source files added to the dl page![/font][/color][/i]
[/size]
[b][size=5]Is something missing in your life?[/size][/b]
[size=3]Are you looking for [i]some other customizable body part [/i]that you can spend hours perfecting? Have you stylized your players body (BodySlide), cock (SoS), hair (SGHairs), armor (TERA Armors), weapons (take your pick) and their associated physical bouncing properties? Do you no longer have anything to take inordinate amounts of time to build the [i]perfect [/i]Stormcloak dog-girl fucking a busty-sub Forsworn dick-girl?[/size]
[size=5] [/size]
[i][b]Well look no further! Areola to the rescue![/b][/i]
[size=3][color=#ffff00][b]Using RaceMenu, this collection of body overlays will allow you to customize your pc's areola and nipples. You can mix and match different types and sizes, specify colors, and generally mish-mash all kinds of shit together to create the perfect nipple/areola combination[/b][/color]
 
It's simple; In RaceMenu:
[list][*]Click the "overlays" tab on the right[/*]
[*]Click the "body" icon on the left.
[/*]
[*][i][b]Make something beautiful and post some screens.[/b][/i]
[/*]
[/list] 
[color=#ffff00][b]Protip[/b]:[/color] when you take screens, upload directly from the screenshots folder on your pc. Much simpler than trying to upload from steamcommunity.com.
 
[i](Ima let you finish, but this is really [b]version 3 of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14391/?]Aureolean[/url]. [/b]It's the same idea but built so differently as to require a whole new everything.)[/i]

[/size][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57157-4-1408259928.png[/img]
[size=6][b]You need . . . [/b][/size][size=3]
[/size][list][*][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]. [/b]Install it. No there isn't an ECE version, no there won't be an ECE version. Don't ask. [/size][/*]
[*][size=3][b]CBBE, ADEC, CSHBHC, BodySlide body types.[/b] If you use a body that is somehow based on one of those, it will probably work. At the moment, there is no UNP version. Maybe . . . I haven't decided yet.[color=#404040] [i](I mean BodySlide is so flexible, why even bother with a dedicated body any more?)[/i][/color][/size][/*]
[/list]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57157-4-1408260256.png[/img]
[size=6][b][color=#ffff00]Emmitt says "Use [/color][url=http://sourceforge.net/projects/modorganizer/][color=#ffff00]Mod Organizer![/color][/url][color=#ffff00]"
[/color][/b][/size]
[list][*][size=3][b][i]Note: The archive has ~93% compression ratio.
[/i][/b][i][b]You will need almost 300 megabyte to uncompress this < 400 kilobyte file [/b](this is not a typo).[/i][/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
You can install it however you want but [url=http://sourceforge.net/projects/modorganizer/][b][i]Mod Organizer [/i][/b][/url]is fast, flexible, and uses [i]current Windows technology[/i] to manage all of your Skyrim, Fallout, and Oblivion mods. [i][b]It is ALL the shit.[/b][/i]
 
[i][b]Even if you're not using Mod Organizer the i[/b][/i][i][b]nstallation is simple: DL the mod and install it. [/b][/i]It replaces nothing and it only installs a handful of overlays that only work with RaceMenu. Therefore you should have zero conflicts, even if you install it manually.
 

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57157-2-1408259928.png[/img]
[/size][color=#ffffff][size=6][font=arial black]Tit Kit:[/font][/size]
[font=arial black][size=4][b]make a martini, then make some nipples. Stella Won't Tell.[/b][/size][/font][/color][/size]
author: monsto brukes
